4.post_text:
We are pleased to have partnered with Her World Woman of the Year Awards this year. A big shout out to #Herworld #womanoftheyear 2016, Dr. Sudha Nair. Her work on family violence has been groundbreaking, helping to shape public policy & in 1999, she founded the Centre for Promoting Alternatives to Violence (Pave), Singapore's first ever family violence specialist centre. She truly is a force behind the wheel; always making a strong difference in her client’s lives and one of those trail-blazing females who break boundaries in their professions and make outstanding contributions to society. Congratulations Dr. Sudha Nair. We are truly honoured to have been part of this prestigious ceremony. 
#noroadblock #herworldwoty

12.post_text:
We are pleased to have been part of Her World Woman of the Year 2016. Since 1991, this award has been given to trail-blazing females who break boundaries in their professions and make outstanding contributions to society. This year, the award was given to Dr Sudha Nair, whose work on family violence has been groundbreaking, helping to shape public policy. In 1999, she founded the Centre for Promoting Alternatives to Violence (PAVE), the first ever family violence specialist centre in Singapore. 

How on earth does Dr. Sudha stay sane being surrounded by so much sadness, we wonder.
"A healthy helping of humour, obviously – if not, you'll be the most miserable person ever,” she quips – plus toughness and tenacity thrown in for good measure. In an exquisitely evocative turn of phrase, she says that “social work requires heart, but it is neither a soft heart nor a calloused one – many of us who practise social work are strong and resolute. The profession needs critical thinkers, creative people to innovate and find pathways for clients when every door appears closed” 
Dr. Sudha Nair is surely well worthy of being christened this year’s Her World Woman of the Year and in our opinion, she truly is a force behind the wheel! #noroadblock #WomanOftheYear #herworld #herworldwoty

13.post_text:
The all-new BMW 7 Series brings you technology like you have never seen it. Setting the benchmark in driving luxury, it offers you leading-edge innovations like the Remote Control Parking function that is particularly useful in a tight spot. Your car can now automatically pull in and out of parking spaces safely within a 3 metre radius, thanks to a number of sensors that supervise braking, acceleration and steering. All you need to do is step out and use the unique BMW Display Key to park your car. What’s more, as the owner of an all-new BMW 7 Series, you will gain access to a world of luxury with BMW Priority Plus*. Receive exclusive access to priority BMW Service pick-ups, luxurious car spa treatment, and a myriad of other privileges.

The all-new BMW 7 Series. The most innovative car in its class.
To reserve your test drive, visit http://bit.ly/book_testdrive

comments.message: Lol
Awesome
